biotools.summary: A package for performing clustering analysis using T-RFLP data. T-RFLP is a newly developed molecular fingerprinting technique mainly used to investigate population structures in microbial communities.

bioschemas.name: T-BAPS
bioschemas.summary: A package for performing clustering analysis using T-RFLP data. T-RFLP is a newly developed molecular fingerprinting technique mainly used to investigate population structures in microbial communities.
